casebody.data:
Antoinette Erdmann, Respondent-Appellant, v Thomas C. Brady, Appellant-Respondent. [718 NYS2d 911]

Order unanimously affirmed without costs for reasons stated in decision at Supreme Court, Howe, J. (Appeals from Order of Supreme Court, Erie County, Howe, J. — Summary Judgment.) Present — Green, J. P., Hayes, Hurlbutt, Kehoe and Balio, JJ.
